metadata.title: AI Plagiarism Checker – Detect AI-Written Text Accurately | detect-ai.me
metadata.description: Accurate AI Plagiarism Checker for detecting AI-written text. Analyze content with confidence scores and detailed insights. Fast, secure, and privacy-friendly.
metadata.keywords: AI Plagiarism Checker, detect AI text, AI content detection, AI writing detector, plagiarism AI

intro.name: intro
intro.title: AI Plagiarism Checker
intro.description: Detect AI-written text with confidence. Paste your content below and our models will analyze linguistic patterns and stylometric signals to estimate the likelihood of AI generation.

items.title: Instant Analysis
items.description: Get fast results with confidence scores.

items.title: Privacy First
items.description: Content is processed securely and not stored.

main.title: Paste Text to Check for AI Writing
main.description: Our AI Plagiarism Checker evaluates sentence cadence, lexical entropy, repetition, and coherence signals that are commonly associated with AI models, presenting a clear overall score alongside practical guidance.
main.tech_description: Longer samples (200+ words) yield more stable statistics and more reliable judgments. Short passages can still be analyzed, but they benefit from additional context and follow‑up review when decisions are consequential.
main.use_cases: Ideal for reviewing essays and assignments, moderating platform submissions, screening editorial content, and verifying internal documents where authenticity and provenance matter.

uploads.text_input_placeholder: Paste your text here (200+ words recommended for best accuracy)...
uploads.min_words_tip: Minimum 200 words recommended for best accuracy

state.auth_required: Please sign in to use AI text detection. Redirecting to login page...

detectResult.insufficient_credits: Insufficient credits. You need at least 1 credit for detection. Please upgrade your plan.
detectResult.unable_verify_credits: Unable to verify credits. Please try again.
detectResult.ai_generated: AI Generated: This text appears to have been created by artificial intelligence.
detectResult.human_created: Human Created: This text appears to be authentic or human-written.
detectResult.confidence_score_desc: Overall Score: Combined analysis from multiple detection models.
detectResult.ai_generated_desc: AI Generated: Detectors found patterns typical of AI-written content.
detectResult.human_created_desc: Human Score: Indicates likelihood of human authorship based on natural style.
detectResult.note: Note: No detection method is 100% accurate. Use results alongside other evidence.
detectResult.ai_pattern_detected: The majority of models detected AI-like patterns.
detectResult.human_pattern_detected: Patterns are more consistent with human writing.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key Features for AI Text Detection
feature.description: An explainable, multi‑model approach that delivers stable, actionable assessments.

items.title: High Accuracy & Robustness
items.description: Combines statistical and semantic indicators to reduce bias from any single detector and improve reliability.

items.title: Explainable Results
items.description: In addition to the overall score, provides guidance and interpretation so you understand why the model leans one way or another.

items.title: Privacy & Security
items.description: Processes content in real time without persistent storage; encrypted in transit to meet compliance needs.

items.title: Ensemble of Models
items.description: Continuously updated to reflect the latest AI writing patterns and detection research.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use the AI Plagiarism Checker
usage.description: Complete a thorough check in three simple steps.

items.title: Paste Your Text
items.description: Provide the content you want to verify; 200+ words recommended for stable statistics.

items.title: Start Analysis
items.description: We run multiple algorithms in parallel to evaluate stylometry, repetition, and generation indicators.

items.title: Review Results
items.description: Check the overall confidence, read the guidance, and decide next steps based on human/AI tendencies.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Built for Real‑World Review Scenarios
benefit.description: Supports education, media, platforms, and enterprise collaborations with practical workflows.

items.title: Assignments and Papers
items.description: Assist instructors and TAs with early screening, highlighting suspicious segments and review cues.

items.title: Platform Moderation
items.description: Help content ops locate likely AI‑generated submissions and uphold community trust.

items.title: Team Compliance
items.description: Safeguard originality in marketing, knowledge bases, and external communications to avoid risk.

items.title: Education & Research
items.description: Provide reliable tooling and data support for studies in authorship and detection methods.

faq.name: faq
faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about AI text detection.

items.title: How many words should I paste?
items.description: We recommend at least 200 words to achieve more reliable results.

items.title: Do you store my text?
items.description: No. Content is processed securely and not stored for future use.
